name: linkedin-job-alert
description: AI agent that monitors Gmail for LinkedIn job alerts and maintains a deduplicated Google Sheet

scripts.deploy: npm run build && source .env && gcloud functions deploy gc-linkedin-job-alert --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-http --entry-point=processJobAlerts --memory=256MB --timeout=60s --region=$GCP_REGION --set-env-vars=GCP_PROJECT_ID=$GCP_PROJECT_ID,SPREADSHEET_ID=$SPREADSHEET_ID --source=.
